SongName: Something Just Like This (Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike Remix)
Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:41.69]I've been reading books of old
[00:44.09]The legends and the myths
[00:46.47]Achilles and his gold
[00:48.81]Hercules and his gifts
[00:51.25]Spiderman's control
[00:53.47]And Batman with his fists
[00:56.45]And clearly I don't see myself upon that list
[00:59.87]
[01:00.10]But she said, where'd you wanna go?
[01:02.77]How much you wanna risk?
[01:04.86]I'm not looking for somebody
[01:07.18]With some superhuman gifts
[01:09.67]Some superhero
[01:12.09]Some fairytale bliss
[01:14.41]Just something I can turn to
[01:16.73]Somebody I can kiss
[01:18.43]
[01:18.74]I want something just like this
[01:21.38]Doo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo
[01:23.58]Doo-doo-doo, doo-doo
[01:25.83]Doo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo
[01:27.36]Oh, I want something just like this
[01:30.07]Doo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo
[01:32.18]Doo-doo-doo, doo-doo
[01:34.24]Doo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo
[01:35.72]Oh, I want something just like this
[01:43.98]I want something just like this
[01:51.81]I want something just like this
[01:54.05]
[02:59.95]Where'd you wanna go?
[03:01.90]How much you wanna risk?
[03:03.98]I'm not looking for somebody
[03:06.26]With some superhuman gifts
[03:08.87]Some superhero
[03:11.18]Some fairytale bliss
[03:13.56]Just something I can turn to
[03:15.83]Somebody I can kiss
[03:17.82]I want something just like this
[03:20.27]
[03:34.10]Oh, I want something just like this
[03:49.05]Oh, I want something just like this
[03:51.27]
